page.title: 03NARBOROUGH
page.content: The centre of Narborough is quite old and very small.Parts of the pavements are cobbled.The centre is based around the church,which looks like a castle. In the newer parts of Narborough there are more facilities.There are not many shops,but they sell a wide variety of goods.We have a small library.There are two pubs; The Narborough Arms is very old and made of wood.We have three garages.There is a railway station,unusual in villages in this area.There are two modern Primary Schools.There are also modern houses and more being built.Next to Narborough park are the Blaby District Council Offices.Around Narborough are a few factories.
